humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor, which is 5.5 cm. Based on the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the size of the tumor is 5.5 cm (maximum dimension of the invasive component), which falls within the T2 category (tumor size 2-5 cm) according to the TNM staging system for cancer. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
